text:
This is such good news. 

I don't know why but the pervasive narrative around #coronavirus felt like a death-sentence. 

#Covid19 news has spread so much fear, that it's so important for ppl's #mentalhealth to have some positive news & somthg to be hopeful about 😄.

#Chloroquine https://t.co/XzHaZ7PHVF
